modShortDescription: Adds options to the main menu for the player to select max spawned animals/zombies in the world. Also allows to have more than 1 claim block via menu option.
modDescription:
Adds options to the main [menu](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-menu/) for the player to select max spawned animals/zombies in the world in SP. Also allows the player to have more than 1 claim block via menu option.

## Changelog

Reupload to fix potential issues.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/KhaineGB/KhaineA20ModletsXML/tree/main/KHA20-SpawnsAndClaims)** for A20
